issue_title: [Bug] Method name 'list' shadows Python built-in function

tdd_plan.summary: Rename TodoApp.list() method to list_todos() to avoid shadowing Python's built-in list() function

implementation_sequence.description: Create tests/test_issue_2609_list_builtin_shadowing.py with test demonstrating that the 'list' method name shadows Python's built-in list() function

implementation_sequence.step: GREEN - Rename method in TodoApp class
implementation_sequence.description: Rename 'list' method to 'list_todos' in src/flywheel/cli.py line 36

implementation_sequence.step: GREEN - Update call site in run_command
implementation_sequence.description: Update app.list(show_all=...) to app.list_todos(show_all=...) on line 104

implementation_sequence.step: GREEN - Update tests to use new method name
implementation_sequence.description: Update all test files that call app.list() to use app.list_todos()
